title: Elementalist Biome Latitude
description: The available latitudinal regions for biomes in the Elementalist game.

oneOf.description: Found closest to the equator, tropical biomes are hot and humid, with a wide variety of plant and animal life.
Slightly further from the equator, subtropical biomes are still warm and humid, but with a wider range of seasonal variation.
Warm temperate biomes are found in the middle latitudes, with warm summers and mild winters.
Cool temperate biomes are found in the higher middle latitudes, with warm summers and cold winters.
Boreal biomes are found in the subarctic regions, with short, cool summers and long, cold winters.
Subpolar biomes are found in the arctic regions, with short, cool summers and long, very cold winters.
Polar biomes are found at the poles, with very cold temperatures year-round.
